source: Rikli, R.E., and Jones, C.J. (2013) Senior Fitness Test Manual, 2nd Edition. Human Kinetics
source_notes: Norms developed for community-dwelling older adults ages 60–94 (Senior Fitness Test battery). Values are extrapolated to younger age groups (20–59) as norms were not originally validated for this population. Reference: Jones, C.J., & Rikli, R.E. (2002). Measuring functional fitness of older adults. The Journal on Active Aging, March-April, 24-30.
protocol: Reach one hand over shoulder, one behind back. Measure overlap (+) or gap (-) between fingertips. Best of two trials per side; record best.
